alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; McClain; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 29 at 10:35PM CDT until March 29 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... West central Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... South central McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1035 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lexington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southeastern Norman, Purcell, Slaughterville, Lexington, Tribbey, Etowah, Brooksville, Macomb and Trousdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
